name: Blank Slate
description:
A puzzle game of observation and hidden information. The data is always in plain sight; you must learn how to see it.

Controls: 

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • E or left mouse button to interact with objects, click to press buttons, Esc to stop interacting.

Headphones/Speakers are recommended -- there are some audio-only cues (like when you enter an incorrect code).

Font: Aramis Italic (freeware): https://www.1001freefonts.com/aramis-italic.font
